title: Akieshann
author: Akieshann
content: Yes,If we got a tattoo in the last three months, it is completely healed, and was applied by a state-regulated facility, which uses sterile needles and fresh ink and we can meet all blood donor eligibility requirements then you can donate blood!.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Well I like to give blood every year and I do not think it is a problem with this. I have seen many times people that are covered with tattoos who are giving their blood. If there is something wrong with your blood they will tell you.

After getting tattooed it is very helpful, medically to stay about 12 months before being able to donate blood

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Can we donate blood if we have Tattoo?Only if the people being donated to have tattoos.  Just curious, does a scar from a wound count as a tattoo if it shows up on the skin?

comments.author: Ikechi
comments.body: Yes, you can donate blood with a tattoo if it was done by a professional in a clean place.but most importantly, after getting the tattoo, you may need to wait a few months and ensure there's no infection.
